alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lafayette; St. Martin; St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 1:17AM CDT until April 16 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Iberia Parish in south central Louisiana... Southeastern Lafayette Parish in south central Louisiana... North central St. Mary Parish in south central Louisiana... Central St. Martin Parish in south central Louisiana... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 116 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Iberia, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lafayette, New Iberia, Catahoula, St. Martinville, Jeanerette, Avery Island, Broussard, Youngsville, Baldwin, Loreauville, Cade, Lydia, Acadiana Regional Airport, Sorrel, Coteau, Lake Fausse Pointe, Charenton and Parks. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Iberia; Lafayette; St. Martin; St. Mary
